00026 typedef enum E_TileLink {
00027     CLASSIC =0,                // Kazdy tile maximalne jednou
00028     PATH                    // Tily by mely tvorit "cestu", mohou se opakovat
00029 } E_TILELINK;

00031 using namespace script;
00032 typedef struct S_ScriptData {
00033             string name;
00034             string help;
00035             string defaultValue;
00036             E_SCRIPTDATAKIND kind;
00037             int value[3];               // tri hodnoty urcujici dany druh (napr. min, max a treti bez fce)
00038 } S_SCRIPTDATA;

00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00042 class C_Script
00043 {
00044     private :
00045         unsigned int iGroup;        // do jake skupiny patri
00046         string kindName;            // jmeno kindScript, ktery tento skript vytvoril
00047         string name;                // nazev skriptu
00048         vector<S_ScriptData> data;  // prevezme z scriptKind data
00049 
00050         vector<int> intData;
00051         vector<string> stringData;
00052         vector<double> doubleData;
00053         vector<vector<S_MAPPOS> > tileData;
00054     public :
00055         C_Script() {iGroup = 0;};
00056         C_Script(vector<S_ScriptData> n_data, string n_name);
00057         ~C_Script();
00058 
00059         void Save(FILE *fw, FILE *fwt);
00060         void Load(FILE *fr);
00061 
00062         void             TranslateTiles(int dX, int dY);
00063 
00064         unsigned int     GetIGroup() {return iGroup;};
00065         string           GetName() {return name;};
00066         int              GetNData() {return data.size();};               // vrati pocet prvku v data
00067         string           GetDataName(int i) {return data[i].name;};   // vrati jmeno danych "dat"
00068         string           GetDataHelp(int i) {return data[i].help;};
00069         E_SCRIPTDATAKIND GetDataKind(int i) {return data[i].kind;};
00070         int              GetDataValue(int iData, int iValue) {return data[iData].value[iValue];};
00071         string           GetString(int iString) {return stringData[iString];};
00072         double           GetDouble(int iDouble) {return doubleData[iDouble];};
00073         int              GetInt(int iInt) {return intData[iInt];};
00074         int              GetNTileInTileLink(int iTileLink) {return tileData[iTileLink].size();};
00075         S_MAPPOS         GetTileInTileLink(int iTileLink, int iTile) {return tileData[iTileLink][iTile];};
00076         vector<S_MAPPOS> GetTileLink(int iTileLink) { return tileData[iTileLink];};
00077 
00078 
00079         void SetName(string n_name) {name = n_name;};
00080         void SetIGroup(int n_iGroup) {iGroup = n_iGroup;};
00081         void DecreaseIGroup() {iGroup--;};
00082         void SetString(string n_string, int iString) {stringData[iString] = n_string;};
00083         void SetDouble(double n_double, int iDouble) {doubleData[iDouble] = n_double;};
00084         void SetInt(int n_int, int iInt) {intData[iInt] = n_int;};
00085 
00086         void AddTileInTileLink(S_MAPPOS n_tile, int iTileLink) {tileData[iTileLink].push_back(n_tile);};
00087         void DeleteTileInTileLink(int iTileLink, int iTile) {tileData[iTileLink].erase(tileData[iTileLink].begin() + iTile, tileData[iTileLink].begin() + iTile + 1);};
00088         void DeleteAllTileInTileLink(int iTileLink) {tileData[iTileLink].clear();};
00089 
00090         void Show();        // ukaze vsechny tily ze vsech tilelinku v sobe
00091 };
